:::config { "language": "shell", "theme": "github-dark" }
cat filesss.txt | xargs -P 2 -I % http -f POST httpbin.org/post filename="%" token="secret" --ignore-stdin
:::expectation
<pre class='phiki language-shell github-dark' style='background-color: #24292e;color: #e1e4e8;'><code data-theme='github-dark' data-lang='shell' class='torchlight' style='--theme-selection-background: #39414a'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #444d56;
